H2.text: when was kudzu introduced to the united states. 1820

H3.text: when was kudzu introduced to the united states. 1876

A4.text: Kudzu was introduced from Japan into the United States at the Japanese pavilion in the 1876 Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia.
